panels.description: Number of stocks in initial purchase

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  initial_position_num_stocks
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Number of Stocks

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  initial_position_price_usd
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  stock_price_usd
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  profit_gbp
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

panels.description: Profit per share x number of shares

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  profit_ignore_slippage_usd
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Profit (Ignore slippage) USD

panels.description: Risk per share x number of shares

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  total_risk_usd
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Total Risk (USD)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  stock_price_usd
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  profit_gbp
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  risk_reward_ratio
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  initial_position_risk_reward_ratio
FROM iceberg
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  peak_current_price_usd
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  peak_profit_gbp
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  initial_stop_loss_usd
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  sell_stop_usd
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

panels.description: Based on risk:reward ration of approx 1:3

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  take_profit_usd
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Take Profit (USD)

panels.description: Sell if share price exceeds this value

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  exit_trade_usd
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Exit Trade (Stop)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  buy_the_dip_usd
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

panels.description: What were the costs to buy the shares ?

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  buytime_slippage_gbp
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time

panels.description: Moving Average Signal. 2=BUY, 4 = SELL, 0 = DO NOTHING.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  ma_signal
FROM iceberg
ORDER BY time
